name: 99 Minutos, Inc.
description: Operator of an e-commerce logistics platform intended to simplify the delivery burden of online retail orders. The company specializes in delivering online shopping products with real-time global positioning system (GPS) tracking and efficient routing within Mexico, Chile, Perú, and Colombia, enabling e-commerce companies to deliver the product at a low cost.
